p_cart_sidebar_message: Includes frame case and lens cloth
p_accessories_subtitle: The best addition to your purchase, our exclusive accessories. {br} Limited offer

p_hometry_subtitle: Select 5 frames to test out for 5 days and we’ll ship them to you—for free!<mobile>Here’s how it works:</mobile>
p_hometry_benefit_pickframes_text: We’ll mail them to you for free. Try them out for 5 days and see which ones you like.
p_hometry_benefit_buy_text: Make it your own by purchasing online and we’ll send you a fresh new pair.
p_hometry_benefit_return_text: Once your 5 days are up, place your box in the mail with the prepaid return label. Done!
p_hometry_animatedsection_title: Sign up for a selection of glasses and we will recommend frames for you.
p_hometry_animatedsection_text: Answer a few quick questions and we’ll suggest some great-looking glasses to fill your Home Try-On.
p_hometry_shop_section_help_link: If you have any other questions, visit our FAQ
p_lenses_subtitle: Here’s everything you need to know when choosing your lenses—in the order you’ll need to know it when you order.
p_home_mensunglasses_text: Each pair is equipped with scratch resistant lenses that block 100% of UVA and UVB rays.
p_home_womensunglasses_text: Choose 5 frames for trying on the house and we will deliver them to you for free!
p_home_meneyeglasses_text: Each pair is equipped with scratch resistant lenses that block 100% of UVA and UVB rays.
p_home_womeneyeglasses_text: Choose 5 frames for trying on the house and we will deliver them to you for free!
c_headermenu_hometry_title: Pick 5 frames to try on at home (it's free!)
terms_and_conditions: By creating this account, you agree to the <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>
benefit_free_shipping_text: It’s on us, always. We offer free returns too.
benefit_prescriptions_text: Add yours at checkout or send it in later. What a breeze.
benefit_more_way_text: You can pay with an FSA or HSA, or see if you can use your insurance with us
favorites_page_empty_text: Save frames you like by tapping the nearby heart. We'll store 'em safely here for you.
p_addresses_empty_text: You have not entered any addresses
c_restore_password_title: How do I reset my password?
c_restore_password_subtitle: Enter your email and we’ll send you a link with instructions to reset your password :-)
p_home_hero_title: Try 5 frames at home for free
eye_exam_description: Comprehensive eye exams are available at or next to all of the below stores. (In some areas, exams are provided by independent optometrists.)
p_product_select_lenses_review_text: With every pair, you’ll get free shipping, hassle-free returns, and our one-year, no-scratch guarantee
p_product_delivery_title: Free shipping and free returns on every order
p_product_delivery_text: We have a 30-day, hassle-free return or exchange policy as well as a one-year, no scratch guarantee for our lenses; we'll replace your scratched lenses for free within the first 12 months.
p_product_lenses_block_text: Every pair of Brillenhof glasses comes with anti-reflective, scratch-resistant lenses that block 100% of UV rays. Pick from a range of lens options to fit your vision needs.
p_eyeglasses_hero_text: Prescription eyeglasses, starting at $95, with free shipping and free returns
p_sunglasses_text: Each pair is equipped with scratch-resistant lenses that block 100% of UVA and UVB rays. Starting at $95, with free shipping and free returns.
quiz_action: Take a quiz to find your frames
video_title: Want to see how our glasses are made?
home_try_text: Want to try five pairs of glasses or sunglasses in the comfort of your very own home? It’s easy. And fun. And free.
home_try_feedback_text: Friendly, quick service. Love the Home Try-On option for five days because it really let me see how wearing one pair felt all day long.
eyeglasses_lenses_text: Every pair of Brillenhof glasses comes with anti-reflective, scratch-resistant lenses that block 100% of UV rays. Pick from a range of lens options to fit your vision needs.
sunglasses_lenses_title: For every pair sold, a pair is distributed to someone in need
sunglasses_lenses_text: Alleviating the problem of impaired vision is at the heart of what we do, and with your help, our impact continues to expand. To this day, we’ve distributed over five million pairs of glasses to people in need.
locations_link: Search all our stores and showrooms
p_home_text: Buying glasses should leave you happy and good-looking, with money in your pocket. Glasses starting at $95, including prescription lenses.
c_search_empty_text: Hm. Doesn’t look like we carry a frame by that name. How about seeing <men-eyeglasses>Men's eyeglasses</men-eyeglasses> or <women-eyeglasses>Women's eyeglasses</women-eyeglasses> or <men-sunglasses>Men's sunglasses</men-sunglasses> or <women-sunglasses>Women's sunglasses</women-sunglasses>?
c_help_subtitle: We’re available by phone <phone>8 (495) 587 98 99</phone> every day from 8 to 21.
